data.title: Starbucks Fall Menu Leaked: Here’s What We Know
data.meta_description: Even though Starbucks fall drinks and treats haven’t officially landed yet, someone has leaked Starbucks' fall menu. Here's what we know!
data.text:
While we’re still in the middle of summer, some people are already getting cozy for fall. Even though fall drinks and treats haven’t officially landed yet, someone has leaked Starbucks’ fall menu.

The information comes from @Markie_Devo on Instagram, who is known for revealing fast-food menu items before they’re officially announced. This year’s fall lineup features the Pumpkin Spice Latte in various forms like iced, hot, or frappuccino. There’s also a new Iced Pumpkin Cream Chai and Pumpkin Cream Cold Brew. For pastries, there’s a Pumpkin Cream Cheese Muffin.

Starbucks Fall Menu

Reactions to the leaked menu have been mixed. One person shared, “Wish they’d incorporate more caramel drinks, not everyone loves pumpkin [crying emoji].” Another chimed in, “Pumpkin cream cold brew is legit the best and I don’t even like pumpkin spice lattes.” And someone else excitedly declared, “Chiiiiiiile that pumpkin cream cheese muffin [heart emoji].”

@Markie_Devo has previously leaked information about Taco Bell’s Mountain Dew Baja Blast Gelato before its official release. The Instagram post read, “It’s finally happening!! Taco Bell is bringing the MTN DEW Baja Blast Gelato nationwide. This is in highlight of Baja Blast 20th ‘BAJAVERSARY’.” Taco Bell later confirmed the news with a press release and additional celebrations.

In addition to pumpkin-themed items, Starbucks is also introducing other fall products, such as an Iced Apple Crisp Cream Chai and a Salted Pecan Cream Cold Foam. There will be a Baked Apple Croissant, Oat Milk Iced Apple Crisp Shaken Espresso, Oat Milk Apple Crisp Macchiato, and a new Iced Oat Milk Pecan Crunch Latte. The fall menu also includes themed treats like the Mummy Cookie and Raccoon Cake Pop (vanilla flavored).

If last year’s timeline is any indication, these fall items could be available around August 22. The Pumpkin Spice Latte launched on August 24 last year, so expect similar timing for these new offerings. However, the Iced Oat Milk Pecan Crunch Latte, Salted Pecan Cream Cold Foam, and the Mummy Cookie may be released later, around September 19.

In May, Starbucks launched their new Summer-Berry Starbucks Refreshers beverages, featuring a trio of drinks with a layer of popping raspberry-flavored pearls for an added burst of flavor.

They also brought back the popular White Chocolate Macadamia Cold Brew and introduced two new treats: the Orange Cream Cake Pop and Pineapple Cloud Cake. Additionally, Starbucks unveiled a summer drinkware collection, which includes an exclusive Stanley x Starbucks Quencher, along with cold cups, keychains, and more.

Kayla is the midday host on Detroit’s 105.1 The Bounce. She started her career in radio back in 2016 as an intern at another Detroit station and worked her way here. She's made stops in Knoxville, TN, Omaha, Ne and other places before returning to Detroit. She’s done almost everything in radio from promotions to web, creating content on social media, you name it. She’s a true Michigander, born and raised. So, you can catch her camping or vacationing up north to exploring the downtown Detroit or maybe even catching a sports game. During her free time, Kayla enjoys watching movies, roller-skating, crafting, and music festivals. She and her husband together dip into many of the great things Michigan has to offer. Together they also like to travel. A few hobbies of hers include wine and beer tastings, crafting, hiking, roller skating, movies, home improvement projects, gardening, and festivals. She’s always looking to take on more local events happening in the community. She loves connecting with the community. When writing, Kayla covers topics including lifestyle, pop culture, trending stories, hacks, and urban culture.
